articles.title: Here's how Hurricane Helene brought "biblical devastation" to western North Carolina in a near "worst-case scenario" - CBS News
articles.description: The North Carolina State Climate Office explains how the "monster storm" left unprecedented damage that will likely "take years to document."
articles.content: Hurricane Helene has proved to be disastrous for Appalachia, as massive amounts of precipitation from the storm caused rampant flooding that has devastated several towns and killed dozens of people. … [+7830 chars]
